professionalExperience.title: Software Engineer Professional Intern
body: Developed a clinic management software utilizing Angular for frontend and C#, ASP.NET for backend.
Implemented key features, such as appointment scheduling, patient records management and billing system.
Designed and developed a custom component, resulting in substantial cost savings for the company.
Collaborated with stakeholders to gather requirements, provide updates, and ensure the desired specifications.
Demonstrated problem-solving skills and the ability to quickly adapt to changing project requirements.
Created a REST API to streamline server-based data manipulation and retrieval processes.

Reinforced the knowledge of Git commands for optimized repository management and collaboration.
Improved team collaboration using Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Usage of Kubernetes for microservice orchestration and database accessibility and reliability.
